title: JIPMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Technical Support Posts
description: The Jawaharlal Institute of Post-Graduation Medical Education and Research (JIPMER) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Technical Support Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc. and M.Sc. can apply for the JIPMER Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education deta...
